title: The Firefly Collective: A Xavier Greene Thriller
description: A series of bombings. A world in chaos. Xavier Greene returns in the thrilling sequel to "The Osiris Initiative!"Deep in the heart of the jungles of Columbia, highly trained assassin Xavier Greene is called back from his search for criminal mastermind James Devos. A series of bombings have left chaos and terror in their wake, and their next target is London. In a desperate race against time, Xavier finds himself pursuing Francisco Ortega, the leader of the Firefly Collective. But, his efforts are complicated when he finds himself at odds with local law enforcement, who disapprove of the trail of bodies left in his wake.Halfway across the world, the plains of Montana bring startling revelations for ex-FBI Agent Stacy Martinez as she investigates a bombing of her own. The international conspiracy she uncovers leads her to England, where her destiny may be altered forever.Reunited against a common enemy, Xavier and Martinez again find their backs against the wall and no one to trust as the clock ticks toward annihilation. With enemies closing in and the threat of destruction looming, can they stop it before it's too late?
author: Ryan McGinnis
